text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLGeneralInformationFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLNursingAreasFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLHomeCareAreasFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLTheraphyAreasFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLPreventionAreasFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/KLThemesFFB

name: KLInformationCodes
title: KLInformation codes
description: Information codes from FSIII and FFB (Omr√•de, Tema, Generelle oplysninger)
